Date 200 years, 3 months, 17 days, AB (after beginning).

*Zapy97 Kerman's face appears on screen, speaking with a low pitched concerned voice, "today we have confirmed hostile aliens, after establishing contact with an unknownspace fleet with a Kerbin Bound trajectory, now 10 years away we must establish a means of defending planet kerbin. Begining with 30 orbiting missle defence platforms that can cordinate a massive volley of missles and destroy almost any thing within range. Second we have prepared a massive armoda of space planes ready to be mobilized with laser and missle attack weapons. Third we have readied thousands of ICBM siloes, all across kerbin. Forth if all else fails there is the dooms day cataclysm, which is designed to turn Kerbin it self into a massive powerful bomb by have 100 Nuclear Fusion bombs placed in key locations beneath its crust to detonate all at once causing Kerbin to implode, then the pressure forceing millions of tons of debris to completely wipe out any orbiting ships within kerbin's system. May god help us-

The screen goes fuzzy as Zapy97 Kerman's transmission is interupted, ten secounds later the Image of a Black Dalek appears on screen shouting,"Exterminate, Exterminate, Exterminate!" *the screen goes fuzzy again then the Intelligent Transmission Unit, says "transmission signal lost"

[Transmission end]

basically in usual non-RP english i am starting a long project to create an inpenatrable defence grid surrounding kerbin by 10 years time in game, for me it will be a test of attention span, but here are the guidlines i am setting for my self:

must be completed by 10 years time.

must have 30 satalites in orbit,

must have a viable space plane ready to launch plenty of anti-ship missles,

must have nuclear ICBMs ready to destroy ships,

must have the 100 fusion bombs across Kerbin's surface.

finally i must post screenshots of my progress towards the end goal every after every part is complete.

Bonus: create dalek space ships to attack Kerbin.
